thread.title: Konami Launches Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain Companion App Android
thread.title_full: Konami Launches Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain Companion App for Android - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Konami Launches Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain Companion App Android
text: The latest installment in the Metal Gear Solid franchise, The Phantom Pain has just made its way to PC and consoles. Along with the new game, Konami released a companion application for Android. The new companion application for Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain is meant to be used as a support terminal to display maps and call in air support helicopters while playing the console version. Keep in mind though that some of the features included in this companion applica... Â»
